Text: Hi Wiiman1982! Great to see someone else uploading .wbfs releases ... just a suggestion ... it is a good idea to have the region (PAL, NTSC, NTSC-J) in the "Torrent name" for indexing/search purposes ;)
Well going by the wbfs file name it is a Pal region.
Thank you will do that on my future uploads
Thanks buddy! i was looking for this title for my kids ;)
